channel.title: Sokcho on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: All of the red snow crab, winter snow on the scab! - Sokcho, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Steamed red snow crab

All of the red snow crab, winter snow on the scab!

Sokcho, Gangwon, South Korea

Sokcho is known as the red crab producing area called red snow crab. Among them, Dongmyeong Port boasts abundant quantities thanks to the red crab boat going in and out. Most people choose “Grab crab” as their delicacy on the east coast, and “Hong crab”, which is being pushed by snow crabs and treated as a two-factor, is also a delicacy. Today I searched for red crabs that can be tasted cheaper than (normal) snow crabs throughout the coast of Gangwon-do.
Snow crab is one of the best on the winter coast. Usually crab legs are elongated and named like bamboo. If you solve it in Chinese characters, it becomes Jukhae (竹 蟹). Red snow crab leading to red crab is similar to snow crab, and sometimes it can be mistaken as snow crab.
Where is it? The neighborhood where you live is different. Most crabs live in depths of 30-1800m and red crabs in soft mud or sandy bottoms. At the depth of 450 ~ 600m, blue crab, a hybrid of snow crab and red crab, is located. It resembles a snow crab and is called ‘You too snow crab’.
It is not difficult to distinguish snow crab from red snow crab!
Before tasting red snow crab, let's take a look. The highest peak of snow crab is bakdae crab. Some people consider ‘박달대게’ as a proper noun. Whether it is domestic or imported, if the flesh is full, it is ‘박달대게’. Normally, domestic prices are set by maridang and imported by weight. You can also see snow crabs in Sokcho, known as the main area for red crabs. The price is flexible, but the average kg is about 100,000 won.
snow crab
It is usually crab although it is less full. The snow crab has a slightly dark brown color instead of the bright red color of the red crab. The color of the snow crab is more noticeable. After the crab is boiled, it turns into a pale pink color with a golden color. The red crab, which was red before steaming, is vivid after it is boiled. There are differences in appearance, but the difference is obvious in taste. If you taste crab and red crab together, you can feel the difference in taste.
Red snow crab
The crab's flesh is sweet. Sweet mussels melt gently in your mouth. When the soft and sweet crab comes into red rather than taste, it comes with a salty taste. Red crabs, which have a relatively salty taste, are often thought to be cheaper than snow crabs. Some of the crabs are filled with red crabs, boasting a ransom equivalent to snow crabs. Still, most of them cannot keep up with the price. Hong crabs, which are caught a lot at this time, boast a ransom ranging from 20,000 won to 6-70,000 won per kg. Red crab with various ransom, where should I eat something?
Snow crab and red snow crab
Some ways to taste red snow crab
“Finding Sokcho Dongmyeong Port with red crabs is the first way to eat fresh red crabs at the cheapest price. It's the cheapest way to buy red crabs at the Dongmyeong Port market and eat them on the 2nd floor of Dongmyeong Live Fish Center. You should eat red crabs at 30,000 won per kilogram. If you hold about 1kg per person, you eat For example, for a family of four, you can taste red crabs for about 120,000 won. ”
Directed red crab market in Dongmyeong Port, Sokcho, Gangwon-do
The red snow crab caught in a trap or net can be eaten all season except July-August. If you spray the traps in the deep sea of more than 1000m and save them, you will come with red crabs that came into the trap. The crabs caught in the trap are fresher than the nets laid in shallow water.
Sokcho-si Suyeong Livestock Center
Even when it's hot, it often dies on the way, and the cold wind is now red. The meat is full and the catch is plenty, which makes it relatively cheap.
Sogecho-si Suhyup Red Crab Plate located behind the Dongmyeong Live Fish Center
I have to pick a red crab at the market. How do I find a crab filled with flesh?
Dongmyeong Live Fish Center 2F
“When I look at the red crab, I see a white strip. Right now, most of the crab meat is full, and this white string is 80% full. Less white lines or faint whites are almost 100% full. It's a different color. Actually, the color is dark and vivid. Knowing this will help you pick a red crab. ”
If you see a white line on your belly, your flesh is not full.
This is the description of the owner of Sokcho Dongmyeong Port. Instead, it's cheaper than eating at a restaurant, but there's no service to cut crabs.
Nearly 100% full of red crab
If you buy crabs at the market, they give you a service. You can take the crab to the 2nd floor of Dongmyeong Live Fish Center or eat it.
Steamed red snow crab
The rice cooked in the crab is also special. When you put crab in a scab and mix it, it tastes like honey without soy sauce or other condiments. On the 2nd floor of Dongmyeong Live Fish Center, you can order rice cooked separately.
If you mix crab with rice, you can feel the rich taste.
You can add a spicy soup to 4,000 won (2 people or more) per person.
Dongmyeong Fresh Fish Center Maeuntang
Of course, there are many places where you can taste red snow crab besides Sokcho Dongmyeong Port. Sokcho Tourist Fish Market Underground, restaurants around Dongmyeong Port, and restaurants that boast red snow crabs around the public playground. It is no exaggeration to say that red snow crabs are caught throughout the east coast, but Sokcho is one of the areas that are not to be missed.
A red snow crab with a vivid red color like its name
Just steamed without any seasoning, delicious red crab. In Sokcho, where there are abundant red crabs, there are specialty red crab restaurants where you can taste various red crab dishes such as black crab radish and red crab ramen. When you eat a variety of cooked crabs, the crab-shelled chitin can help lower cholesterol while preventing fat from accumulating in your body. Not only does it taste good, but it also takes care of your health. You can eat red snow crab with a little bit of cheongju and steam for 15 minutes. Before spring, why don't you go on a trip to enjoy the red crab with fresh sea.
Toss with red crab seasoned with seasoned red snow crab
Travel info

1. Nearby restaurants

Dongmyeong Live Fish Center: Sokcho-si Dongmyeong-dong / 033-631-1288
Hongge Sarang 1 Store: 17, Yeongrang-dong, Sokcho-si
Direct Market No.2 Grace Fisheries: Sokcho-si Dongmyeong-dong / 010-6370-2342

2. Accommodation

Hotel Amaranth: 55 Sokcho City Oncheon-ro / 033-636-5252
Chucksan Oncheonjang: 288 Tourist-ro, Sokcho-si / 033-636-4806
Benikea Hotel Mountain and Sea Daepo Port: 3691, Donghae-daero, Sokcho-si 033-635-6644

※ The above information was updated in December 2018 and may change afterwards, so please check before you travel.

item.title: Sokcho, Gangwon, South Korea - Go catch Pokemon! Pokemon Go in Sokcho
item.description:
View from Sokcho Lighthouse Observatory

Go catch Pokemon! Pokemon Go in Sokcho

Sokcho, Gangwon, South Korea

In the summer of 2016, the Pokemon Go craze is not unusual. Pokemon Go is not yet officially released in Korea, but games are available in Sokcho, Gangwon-do and some surrounding areas. As this fact became known, Sokcho stood as 'Pokemon Holy Land'. Those who want to catch Pokemon flocked to Sokcho from all over the country. Sokcho buses were sold out, and a quick travel agency also offered travel packages to catch Pokemon. Let's take a look around playing Sokcho and Pokémon Go games that are screaming with the holiday season.
Sokcho, located between Goseong and Yangyang, Gangwon-do, has mountains, lakes, and sea as well as geographical advantages within two hours from the metropolitan area. Why don't you take a more meticulous trip to Sokcho with this Pokemon hunting? If you don't forget to lift your head to the reality behind the phone, it will be a trip to Pokémon holding Pokemon and Sokcho. Be careful about safety accidents.
Pokemon Go, are you?
In Pokemon Go, monsters appear in places where many people actually go. Since Pokemon is one of the most popular destinations, you need to know the local hotspots to meet many Pokemon. In the same vein, Sokcho's 11 most visited sites are the most popular tourist attractions of Sokcho. Among them are the Jangjang, where the bare-handed squid festival is in full swing.
I confess before I start catching a real monster. The reporter does not know the game. I've played Tetris games and have no interest in games or hobbies. The words augmented reality can only sound alien. I didn't understand why I was so enthusiastic that it was difficult to download the Pokemon Go app under the Korean account.
Augmented Reality Pokemon Go with 3D Graphics
Augmented Reality (AR) refers to a technology that displays computer-generated 3D graphics on a visible environment. In other words, if you run Pokemon Go, you will see the environment as if you were taking a picture, and monsters would appear on it. Then throw the monster ball to catch the Pokemon. Of course, it's not as easy as it sounds.
Augmented Reality Pokemon Go with 3D Graphics
Pokemon Go is a location-based game of Google Maps on your smartphone that requires monsters to enter a specific area. South Korea is missing here, but some survived and the Pokemon Go game was executed. That is Gangwon Sokcho and some surrounding areas. In addition to Sokcho, two other Pokemon Go viable areas, including Ulleung and Ulju-gun, Gyeongbuk are being discovered.
33-year-old office workers run from Seoul to Sokcho
Pokemon Go base camp, Sokcho, Expo Tower Park
In Sokcho, the sacred place of Pokemon, the center of Pokemon Go is Cheongcho Lake and Expo Tower Park. Wi-Fi maps and free smartphone charging are also available. Most of all, Pokémon seduces the hunters (?) So that you can take the Cheongcho Lake Expo Tower as a base camp and explore Abai Village, Sokcho Tourist Fish Market, Dongmyeong Port and Sokcho Beach.
Three generations of Pokemon Go
For us, Abai Village, famous for filming the drama "Autumn Fairy Tales", is a collective settlement of displaced people. Originally it was a place where few people lived, but when refugees gathered during the Korean War, a village was formed. There are many specialty shops where you can taste the Sunbuk style. Abai Village (Cheongho-dong) and Jungang-dong are located in a quiet place. Sokcho Tourist Fish Market, famous for Chicken Gangjeong and Alley of Chicken, is also considered a Pokemon hot spot. When you go to the market, take a good look around, and remember the meeting center in the basement of the fish market.
Abai Village where refugees were displaced during the Korean War
The next destination is the same name port. Let's go up to the lighthouse observatory that is Sokcho's proud view point. When the weather is good, you can see Sokcho city, as well as Sokcho Beach and Oeongchi Beach. Don't miss the Sokcho sea view from Yeonggeumjeong Observation Deck.
North Sokcho Port Details
If you go north from Dongmyeong Port, it is a Jangjeo, and if you go south, Sokcho Beach. First, let's go to the market where the squid man-handed festival is held until July 31. Squid fishing is in full swing along the small beach. Enjoy a short walk to the lighthouse with Pokemon.
genus
Sokcho Beach is now. You can enjoy exciting bathing on the fine sandy beach. Here, too, face those who came to catch Pokemon.
Young people from Busan to play Pokemon Go
The seven-year-old kid from Seoul was more engaged in games than swimming. Young people from Seoul and Busan were also busy catching monsters.
7 year old kid from Seoul
If you are uncomfortable with Sokcho Beach, head to Oeongchi Beach.
Sokcho beach view
In both directions, so if you keep the sea on your left and go down, you will reach outland. You can enjoy swimming in a relatively quiet sea.
Sokcho beach view
If you stop at Daepo Port, you will see all the monsters on the coast. Now let's go to Seoraksan.
Road to Mt. Geumseong by Seoraksan Cable Car
Seoraksan is known as an unexpected Pokemon Haunting Area. It is often called Seorak in Sokcho area, and it is enough to take a cable car to look at Kwon Geumseong and look at Sinheungsa, an obscene music inspector. Shinheungsa was founded in 652 by the ruler named Hyangseongsa.
Seoraksan Sinheungsa Temple

Throughout the wait for the cable car, people were busy catching Pokemon. I could not see the face of Mt. Sorak in the thick fog, but it was obvious that it was a different experience. Rumors that there is a Pokemon in Everest will not be rumored. Some even go out of the boat to catch rare Pokemon. In all cases, don't forget it's a safety first. Pokemon Go's completion is a safe return.

Due to the Pokemon Go craze, Sokcho City began providing the integrated Pokemon Go online map on the City Hall website (www.sokcho.gangwon.kr) on July 26th. The integrated map, based on Google Maps, shows 8 locations of Sokcho tours, including the location of the `` Pocket Stop '' charging station, Pokemon training and combat space `` Pokemon Go Gymnasium '', and a free battery charging station. If you have a Pokemon Go hunting plan, you should check the benefits to the game users. If you catch 30 Pokémon by August 8, you can visit Sokcho City Museum for free.

Soraksan Cable Car
Travel info
